result.eng: In place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ga: in áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn

result.eng: She wasn't allowed to eat along with the family.

result.eng: When he was 11 years of age, the whole family moved to France.

result.eng: The family was suffering from poverty.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
